column3: content-intro&quot
column13: is a community of subject matter experts from several disciplines who align AI models by creating high-quality data in their field of expertise to build the future of Generative AI. Alignerr is operated by Labelbox. Labelbox is the leading data-centric AI platform for building intelligent applications. Teams looking to capitalize on the latest advances in generative AI and LLMs use the Labelbox platform to inject these systems with the right degree of human supervision and automation. Whether they are building AI products by using LLMs that require human fine-tuning, or applying AI to reduce the time associated with manually-intensive tasks like data labeling or finding business insights, Labelbox enables teams to do so effectively and quickly.&lt

column3: &amp

Current Labelbox customers are transforming industries within insurance, retail, manufacturing/robotics, healthcare, and beyond. Our platform is used by Fortune 500 enterprises including Walmart, Procter &amp
column5: Gamble, Genentech, and Adobe, as well as hundreds of leading AI teams. We are backed by leading investors including SoftBank, Andreessen Horowitz, B Capital, Gradient Ventures (Google&#39
column6: s AI-focused fund), Databricks Ventures, Snowpoint Ventures and Kleiner Perkins.&lt

column3: Are you an advanced gamer with a passion for AI and robotics? We&#39
column4: re looking for individuals with top-tier gaming skills to play a crucial role in training and improving robotic systems using the latest advances in foundation models. In this role, you’ll use your gaming expertise to operate and interact with robotic systems, helping to collect data and refine behaviors that push the boundaries of AI and robotics. This is an exciting opportunity to apply your in-game skills to real-world challenges and contribute to the development of advanced robotics technologies.&lt

column3: &lt
Ensure that robotic systems operate successfully in customer use cases via teleoperation with a focus on data gathering and data generation.&lt
Run robotic systems continuously throughout the day, identifying bugs and technical issues and generating collected data for ongoing improvements.&lt
Operate robotic systems using advanced controls (joysticks, VR, first-person view) to simulate real-world interactions and scenarios.&lt
Follow proper equipment and robot maintenance procedures, including setup and operation.&lt
&lt
&lt
column7: – Exceptional skills in strategy, hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, and spatial awareness developed through gaming.&lt

column3: &lt
column7: – Experience with joystick, VR, FPV, or similar control interfaces is a plus.&lt

column3: &lt
column7: – Enthusiasm for learning about robotics, AI, and automation technologies, and their real-world applications.&lt

column3: &lt
column9: – Ability to think quickly, troubleshoot problems, and adapt to new technologies and environments.&lt

column3: &lt
column7: – Precision and accuracy in interacting with robotic systems to ensure high-quality data collection&lt

column3: &lt

column3: &lt
column7: Identify potential biases or limitations in AI’s sense of humor. Design tests to ensure its humor is culturally relevant and inclusive.&lt

column18: Shape the future of AI in Theoretical Chemistry.&lt
column26: This innovative role as an AI Trainer - Theoretical Chemistry offers a unique opportunity to leverage your subject-matter expertise and develop your AI skills. You will play a pivotal role in training AI models, ensuring the accuracy and relevance of theoretical chemistry concepts generated by AI. This position allows for flexible scheduling, and your contributions will directly impact the advancement of AI in Theoretical Chemistry.&lt

column3: &lt
&lt
column7: Analyze and provide feedback on AI-generated outputs related to theoretical chemistry. Your guidance will improve the AI’s accuracy in topics such as molecular modeling, quantum chemistry, and computational methods.&lt

column3: &lt
column7: Use your expertise to provide step-by-step solutions and explanations for problems involving chemical bonding, energy calculations, and reaction dynamics. Your input will help AI learn to reason through theoretical chemistry challenges effectively.&lt

column3: &lt
column7: Identify potential biases, inaccuracies, or limitations in the AI’s understanding of theoretical chemistry. Design tests that ensure its outputs are robust and applicable to practical applications.&lt

column3: You create your own working hours depending on project length.&lt
&lt
Enrolled in or have completed a Bachelor’s degree or higher from an accredited institution.&lt
Native-level proficiency in Theoretical Chemistry.&lt
Possess a strong writing style with excellent English-language spelling and grammar skills.&lt
Have a critical eye and the ability to clearly articulate the strengths and weaknesses of written text.&lt
Professional writing experience as a researcher, journalist, technical writer, editor, or similar roles.&lt

column3: As a Telerobotics Operator, you’ll have a hands-on role in advancing general-purpose robotics, helping to teach robots new behaviors and skills while contributing to the development of AGI-level intelligence in real-world environments. You will be responsible for operating robots in diverse, dynamic settings, collecting critical data to improve AI systems, and refining robotic behaviors over time. Your work will involve testing real-world use cases, troubleshooting performance issues, and ensuring safe and reliable operation. By expanding the capabilities of foundational models, you’ll play a key role in enabling robots to perform increasingly complex tasks, adapt to new challenges, and operate effectively in unpredictable conditions.&lt
&lt
Ensure that robotic systems operate successfully in customer use cases via teleoperation with a focus on data gathering and data generation.&lt
Run robotic systems continuously throughout the day, identifying bugs and technical issues and generating collected data for ongoing improvements.&lt
Operate teleoperation equipment as needed to guide the robot through specific behaviors.&lt
Follow proper equipment and robot maintenance procedures, including setup and operation.&lt
&lt
Strong sense of ownership in ensuring that general purpose robots function properly.&lt

Teleoperation experience is a plus – Familiarity with operating remote-controlled fleets, drones, or robotic systems in manufacturing or industrial settings is beneficial for ensuring efficient and precise control in dynamic environments.&lt
Attention to detail – Precision and focus when operating robots to ensure accurate data collection, task execution, and system performance.&lt

column3: About the Role&lt

Become a vital part of revolutionizing the legal landscape! As an AI Tutor - Law (USA), you will be instrumental in developing AI models capable of understanding and navigating the complexities of the US legal system. Your legal expertise will be crucial in shaping how AI interacts with legal concepts, ensuring accuracy and ethical considerations across various legal domains including civil law, criminal law, contract law, property law, family law, intellectual property law, constitutional law, administrative law, and litigation procedures. Your deep understanding of legal research, case analysis, and legal reasoning will be applied to educate and evaluate our AI models, paving the way for innovative legal tech solutions.&lt
Your Day to Day&lt
Educate AI: Analyze and refine AI-generated outputs on diverse legal topics, providing detailed feedback to improve accuracy and comprehension. You&#39
column4: ll work with the AI to refine its understanding of key legal precedents, statutory interpretation, and the application of law to real-world scenarios.&lt

column3: Problem Solving: Guide the AI through complex legal problems, providing step-by-step solutions and explanations that are clear to both human and artificial learners. This will involve teaching the AI to analyze fact patterns, identify relevant legal issues, and construct sound legal arguments.&lt
Red Teaming: Leverage your legal acumen to rigorously test the AI&#39
column4: s capabilities. Design scenarios that expose potential biases, ethical concerns, or limitations in the AI&#39
column5: s understanding of the law. Your insights will be crucial for refining the AI&#39
column6: s decision-making process and ensuring responsible development.&lt

column3: About You&lt
Juris Doctor (JD) degree from an accredited law school in the United States, or a Bachelor&#39
column4: s degree with significant experience in legal research and analysis.&lt

column3: Strong command of US legal principles, procedures, and precedents.&lt
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain complex legal concepts in a clear and concise manner.&lt
Analytical and critical thinking skills, with a passion for exploring the intersection of AI and law.&lt
A demonstrated interest in legal technology and the responsible development of AI is highly desirable.&lt

column5: Gamble, Genentech, and Adobe, as well as hundreds of leading AI teams. We are backed by leading investors including SoftBank, Andreessen Horowitz, B Capital, Gradient Ventures (Google&#39

column3: As an AI Tutor, Mathematics, you will play a crucial role in advancing the capabilities of cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Your expertise will be leveraged to label and annotate complex mathematical data, providing the foundation for training and refining AI models. You will work on projects involving a wide range of mathematical concepts, ensuring that AI systems can understand, interpret, and solve problems with human-level accuracy. This is a project-based, remote freelance role.&lt
&lt
Data annotation: Accurately label and categorize mathematical expressions, equations, proofs, word problems, and other relevant data.&lt
Concept mapping: Connect mathematical concepts and establish relationships between different areas of mathematics to help AI models understand the underlying structure of the subject.&lt
Problem-solving verification: Analyze AI-generated solutions to mathematical problems, identifying errors and providing feedback to improve model accuracy.&lt
Curriculum development: Contribute to the development of comprehensive training datasets that cover a wide range of mathematical concepts and difficulty levels.&lt
&lt

We are seeking highly motivated individuals with a strong foundation in mathematics and a passion for shaping the future of AI. You should be comfortable working independently, have excellent analytical skills, and be detail-oriented. We have three levels of expertise for this role:&lt
Level 1 (Bachelor&#39
column4: s Level): Strong understanding of arithmetic, algebra, geometry, trigonometry, and basic calculus. Ability to solve math word problems and familiarity with basic probability and statistics.&lt

column3: Level 2 (Master&#39
column4: s Level): In addition to Level 1 requirements, proficiency in calculus and advanced math concepts like linear algebra, differential equations (ordinary and partial), and discrete mathematics. Familiarity with mathematical model building and basic game theoretic concepts.&lt

column3: Level 3 (PhD Level): Expert-level understanding of advanced mathematical concepts, including theorem proving, complex analysis, abstract algebra, topology, and advanced statistical modeling techniques. Experience with research and the ability to explain complex mathematical concepts clearly.&lt
&lt
Excellent problem-solving skills and analytical thinking ability.&lt
Strong attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy.&lt
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.&lt
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.&lt
&lt
